GK19gp12-22u:2: [1] atha paredyavi ca kathā prathate sma,
GK19gp12-22u:3: [2] yathā snigdhakaṇṭha uvāca-yadyapi kālenālpena [BhP 10.8.26] ityādi-rītyā varṣa-traya-traya-paryāyeṇa tayor vayo-gaṇanā nirṇītā,
GK19gp12-22u:4: tathāpi kaumāraṃ tu varṣam ekam adhikam adhirūḍham,

GK19gp12-22u:6: [3] tatas tad-bhāvānugāmitayā rāmasya ca tathā vṛttaṃ sutarām eva vṛttam /

GK19gp12-22u:10: tad evam eva saṅgacchate kālenālpena ityādi /

GK19gp12-22u:23: keśaṃ veśaṃ ca pūrvād adhika-mitim ayat keli-śikṣā-pravīṇaṃ
GK19gp12-22u:24: paugaṇḍaṃ prāg acaṇḍaṃ sphurad alam anayor māṃ didṛkṣuṃ karoti //
GK19gp12-22u:26: [5] tadā ca kadācic chrī-vraja-rājñī sabhāntaḥ prātar āyātā śrīmad-abhinanda-patnī sayatnī-bhavantī tāṃ papraccha-yātaḥ kṛṣṇa-mātar,

GK19gp12-22u:32: [7] kiṃ ca, tad-avadhi yadā sandhyāyāṃ mayā dhyāyamānāgamanaṃ saha-vatsaḥ samāgacchati,

GK19gp12-22u:71: [21] tad etad varṇyamānam ākarṇya tayor mukhaṃ nirvarṇya sa-vismayaṃ tūṣṇīmbhūṣṇutayā virājamāne vrajeśāne sarve' pi tam ūcuḥ-yadyapy adya-jātāv iva sujātāv amū,

GK19gp12-22u:853: śrīmān kṛṣṇas tu sāgrajaḥ saha-sakhi-vrajaḥ puraskṛta-dhenur vādita-veṇur vrajan

GK19gp12-22u:867: anusmṛtya vismṛta-sarvendriya-kṛtyaḥ sa-bāṣpa-kaṇṭhaḥ snigdhakaṇṭhas tasyāṃ sabhāyāṃ
GK19gp12-22u:869: [21] śrīmad-vrajarājādayas tu tad-abhiprāya-jānānāḥ sadayatayā tadīya-sāntva-vidhaye sāvadhānā nānā-vidha-vidhānam ācarantaḥ sarva eva cintāturā babhūvuḥ /
GK19gp12-22u:870: [22] tat-tad-vidhānasya cākiñcit-karatāyām aviratāyāṃ madhukaṇṭha eva tān sphurad-utkaṇṭhaḥ

GK19gp12-22u:873: rajanī-mukham anu jananī-lālanam iti kalitaṃ jita-kalinā //dhru//

GK19gp12-22u:884: [24] atha svasthāvasthatayā kuṇṭhatā-rahitas tādṛśa-guṇa-mahitaḥ snigdhakaṇṭhaḥ sa-bāṣpa-kaṇṭham uvāca-
GK19gp12-22u:885: so' yaṃ gopāla-bhūpāla tanayas tava nirdayaḥ /

GK19gp12-22u:887: [25] tad evaṃ vṛtte nivṛtte sarvatra ca vraja-jane gṛha-vartmānuvṛtte nityavad eva vraja-mahendra-tanūjas tau sūta-rāja-tanūjau saṅgata eva nināya /
GK19gp12-22u:888: nītvā ca tayor ātmanā tṛtīyaḥ san prasaṅgataḥ pracchannatayā papraccha-kathayataṃ,
GK19gp12-22u:889: katham etāvān kasmān mūrcchāveśaḥ kleśa iva parāmṛṣṭaḥ? iti /
GK19gp12-22u:892: [27] kṛṣṇaś ca sa-tṛṣṇam uvāca-jānīma eva kevalaṃ na,
GK19gp12-22u:893: kintu tadānīṃ svayam api nitarām ācarāmas,
GK19gp12-22u:894: tathāpi tad varṇanam ākarṇayitum icchāmaḥ / tathā hi-
GK19gp12-22u:895: svayam api yat puru racitaṃ tad yadi hṛdayaṃ tadā sadā śrāvyam /
GK19gp12-22u:896: kāvyaṃ nija-sacitaṃ yat tad idaṃ yuvakāṃ parasparaṃ śṛṇuthaḥ //JGc_1,14.15// [gīti]
GK19gp12-22u:897: [28] tasmāt prathamaṃ tāvat preyasī-gaṇādhikāyā rādhikāyā bimboṣṭhī-goṣṭhī-madhyam adhyāsya vyasyatām eṣā paṭīyasī rasa-paripāṭī /
GK19gp12-22u:899: yad antar yasya sarvaṃ tat tasya jānāty abhīpsitaḥ /

GK19gp12-22u:901: [30] kṛṣṇaś ca sānandam uvāca-tad adya naktam evānavadyā seyaṃ vidyā nivedyatām iti

GK19gp12-22u:916: subala-madhu-maṅgalādibhir antaraṅga-saṅgibhiḥ saṅgataḥ sūtāṅga-jātābhyāṃ ca tābhyām
GK19gp12-22u:919: [2] akasmād āgate ca tasmin sasmita-krīḍā-narma-juṣām amūṣāṃ sambhrama-bhrama-vismaya-smaya-trapā-patrapādarādara-harṣa-tarṣādayas
GK19gp12-22u:920: te bhāvā yugapad eva samutpannāś citrīyamāṇatāṃ citrāyamāṇatām apy āceruḥ / atra ca,

GK19gp12-22u:922: daśām akṣṇor nānā-drutam apidadhe sā nata-mukhī /
GK19gp12-22u:924: sa-bāṣpā stabdhābhābhavad iti samaṃ yā na ghaṭate //
GK19gp12-22u:926: [3] atha praguṇa-guṇālaṅkṛtā kiṅkarī-tatir vitasti-daghna-rāṅkavās taraṇena tam ativistīrṇaṃ maṇi-kīrṇam alindam āstīrṇaṃ cakre /
GK19gp12-22u:927: āstīrṇasya ca tasya pratīcī-pracita-sulalita-tulikāyāṃ prācī-mukhatayā svayaṃ niviśamānaḥ
GK19gp12-22u:928: śubhratārāma-cāmarādi-karābhiḥ kiṅkarībhiḥ sevyamānaḥ śrī-rādhāyā bahir api virājamāna-prāṇaḥ
GK19gp12-22u:933: yayo rāga-tālādi-sāhāyakāḥ sakhāya eva kecana sacante sma /
GK19gp12-22u:934: [6] yau khalu dvayor api tayoḥ savayasām āvalyor ardha-maṇisara-vallyor ivāgrima-sīma-madhyam
GK19gp12-22u:936: sarvatra prathita-dṛṣṭi-prasādam api mithaḥ samarpita-netra-tribhāga-rāgaṃ tan-mithunam
GK19gp12-22u:938: [7] tataś ca prahasya nava-ghana-śyāmenādi-śyamānatayā sāvadhānatāṃ dadhānāv ānandād ubhāv eva saṃhitāñjali-karau nāndī-karau babhūvatuḥ /
GK19gp12-22u:940: imau gaurī-śyāmau manasi viparītau bahir api
GK19gp12-22u:941: sphurat tat-tad-vastrāv iti budha-janair niścitam idam /
GK19gp12-22u:943: dadhan mūrti-bhāvaṃ pṛthag apṛthag apy āvirudabhūt //
GK19gp12-22u:946: śrīr āsāṃ na tulāṃ bibharti nitarām ity uddhavaḥ kīrtayan
GK19gp12-22u:947: yāsām aṅghri-rajo nanāma hariṇā yaḥ svena tulyo mataḥ /
GK19gp12-22u:955: so' yaṃ buddhiṃ naḥ samiddhāṃ karotu //JGc_1,15.4// [śāliṇī]
GK19gp12-22u:956: iti parasparaṃ sa-vailakṣya-smitam īkṣitvā sthitayos tayoḥ snigdhakaṇṭha eva sotkaṇṭham uvāca-
GK19gp12-22u:957: [11] atha śrī-kṛṣṇa-janmādi-mādhuryavad eva śrī-rādhikāyās tat-tan-mādhurī varṇanīyeti nirṇaye' py ativistīrṇatā-saṅkocanāya kiñcid eva sūcayiṣyāmaḥ
GK19gp12-22u:962: janmārabhya harer vraja-sthalam abhūd viśva-rddhi-yuktaṃ punar

GK19gp12-22u:966: [14] bṛhad-gautamīye' py eṣā sarvato labdha-viśeṣā prastūyate-
GK19gp12-22u:969: [15] alaṃ-lakṣmīṇām etad-ādīnāṃ lakṣmīṇāṃ janma ca śrīmat-parjanyam ārabhya dhanyatayā
GK19gp12-22u:970: labhyasya puruṣa-trayasya paramātula-stotrāṇāṃ mātula-gotrāṇāṃ ye khalv āmuṣyāyaṇa-kulatā-nirbandhinaḥ
GK19gp12-22u:971: sambandhinas tebhya eveti māgadhānām anusandhānaṃ sa-yatnī-bhūya yajña-patnīs tyaktavatas
GK19gp12-22u:973: [16] tad evaṃ sthiteṣu ca śrī-rādhikāyās tu sarvato' py āḍhya-kulīnāś chrīmad-vṛṣabhānutayā labdha-khyātikān mahā-gopa-payonidher janma sammatam
GK19gp12-22u:975: satyaṃ bahu-suta-ratnā- karatāṃ na prāpa gopa-dugdhābdhiḥ /
GK19gp12-22u:977: [18] sā khalu śrī-kṛṣṇa-janma-varṣānantara-varṣe sarva-sukha-satre rādhā-nāmni nakṣatre jāteti rādhābhidhīyate /
GK19gp12-22u:978: [19] janmānantaraṃ tasyāḥ san-mādhurī ceyaṃ kṛtāvalokena lokena kīdṛg iti pṛcchataḥ prati nirūpitā-
GK19gp12-22u:979: navendur mūrtir vā kanaka-kamalaṃ vaktram athavā
GK19gp12-22u:980: cakorau netre vā visarad-amṛtaṃ dṛṣṭir athavā /

GK19gp12-22u:985: harim anu vindati śaśval lakṣmīr iti yā tu sarvataḥ khyātā /
GK19gp12-22u:986: tām api kila gopāyituṃ gopī-saṃjñā jayanti tā lakṣmyaḥ //JGc_1,15.8// [āryā*]
GK19gp12-22u:989: yathā candramasaḥ puṣṭis tathā tasya rucām api //JGc_1,15.9// [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp12-22u:990: [21] tatra kaumāra-madhyam adhyāsīnāyāṃ śrī-rādhikāyāṃ tadānītanānāṃ keṣāñcin nārī-janānām utprekṣā yathā-paśya paśya,
GK19gp12-22u:995: [22] tad evam īdṛg-vayasi paryavasite tadādīnāṃ tāsāṃ saundarya-sārasya pracāraḥ sarvata eva prasarpan mātara-pitarādibhir nāpasarpayitum īśāñcakre cintayāmāse ca,
GK19gp12-22u:997: durjanaḥ kaṃsaḥ kiṃ samprati sampratipatsyate iti /
GK19gp12-22u:998: [23] atha pratyaham eva pratyekam antaḥ paraspara-militāḥ santaś ca te sarve vicāritavantaḥ,
GK19gp12-22u:1000: tatrāpy āsāṃ śrīman-nanda-nandanād avaras tu na varatām arhati /
GK19gp12-22u:1001: avara eva hi sarvaḥ / tathā hi-
GK19gp12-22u:1002: kanyā dhanyatamā ramām api jitāṃ kurvanty amūr nandajaḥ
GK19gp12-22u:1003: svasmād ūnadaśāṃ ramā-ramaṇam apy āsādayan dṛśyate /
GK19gp12-22u:1004: tasmāt tulyatayā sa eva varatām arhaty amūṣāṃ tadapy
GK19gp12-22u:1006: [24] atha, yadyapy adhunā yajña-sūtram alabdhavatas tasya na vivāhāvasaraḥ sambhavati,
GK19gp12-22u:1007: tathāpi sajjana-samājñām ācārya bhāṣā-bandhaś ca sandhātavya iti /
GK19gp12-22u:1008: [25] tad etad vicārya sthitānāṃ teṣāṃ niścayāvadhāraṇa-pūrvakaṃ tan nivāraṇaṃ prati
GK19gp12-22u:1009: pūrvavad eva vasudeva-mantraṇayā yantrita-vicāra-vargatayāpi gargaḥ sarva-darśitayā
GK19gp12-22u:1011: [26] tal-līlā-kramaḥ khalv ayaṃ duratyayatayā mayāsugamas tal-līlā-śakti-prayutānām asmākaṃ ca tatra pratyag-vadācaraṇe' pi nāradavan na pratyavāyas,
GK19gp12-22u:1012: tathāpi tathā prathanīyam yathā tāsāṃ na pratyavāyaḥ syād,
GK19gp12-22u:1015: [27] tad evaṃ vimṛśan sa kila vilambam anavalambamānaḥ śrī-vrajam ājagāma /
GK19gp12-22u:1016: āgamya ca nijam uṭaja-taṭaṃ sa-dhyānam adhyāsīnāṃ paurṇamāsīṃ prati jagāma /
GK19gp12-22u:1017: gatvā ca sarvam evedaṃ nivedya punar nivedayāmāsa,
GK19gp12-22u:1019: bhavatyā tu tāsāṃ yathānyatra patyādi-vyavahāraḥ satyāya na kalpate,
GK19gp12-22u:1021: [28] tad evaṃ tāṃ sambhāṣya śrīmad-vrajarāja-sambhāṣaṇaṃ nirvāhya,
GK19gp12-22u:1023: te ca tam āgatam akasmān niśāmya śāmyac-cintā-tamasaḥ sva-sva-manoratha-labdhaye lubdha-manasaḥ praṇāmādibhiḥ paripūjya kuśalam anuyujya pracchannatayā tam evārthaṃ papracchuḥ,
GK19gp12-22u:1026: [29] sa tūvāca-vayam idaṃ sarvam apūrvaṃ pūrvam api jānīmahe /
GK19gp12-22u:1028: kintv ekā śaṅkā śaṅkur iva maṅkṣu hṛdi parivartate /
GK19gp12-22u:1029: yadā bhavad-aṅga-jātāṅganānāṃ vraja-rājāṅgaja-vara-kumāreṇa saha saṅgamaḥ syāt,
GK19gp12-22u:1030: tadā nātivilamabataḥ sarvasyāpi vrajasya tadīya-cira-vipralambha-lambhanaṃ bhavitā,
GK19gp12-22u:1032: kiṃ ca, prauḍhatām ūḍhavatīnāṃ tu sahaja-tad-anurāga-svābhāvyenādarśane' py udbhavat-tat-sphūrtīnāṃ
GK19gp12-22u:1033: na ko' pi tasmād vinivartanaṃ kartuṃ samarthaḥ syād ity api kadarthanāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK19gp12-22u:1034: tasmān nanda-kulāvataṃsāt kaṃsāc ca vañcayituṃ cañcalam evānyebhyaḥ sampradātavyā navyāḥ kanyakāḥ /
GK19gp12-22u:1035: [30] tad evam ādiśya prasthite yadu-purohite tat-kṛtopadeśopajātādaro nija-nija-kanyā-gopana-paro gopa-nikaro' pi tāsāṃ sampradānāya sampradānam anveṣṭuṃ suṣṭhu cintām avāpa,
GK19gp12-22u:1036: kintu santatam asya sā lālasā tu nālasā jātā /
GK19gp12-22u:1037: [31] tad evam etāsāṃ sva-tanayena pariṇayanaṃ prati vrajapati-jampatī ca pūrvam atīva tīvra-spṛhā-gṛhīta-cittāv āstām /
GK19gp12-22u:1039: kintu gargeṇa tadvad eva nirastāv ity astamita-prayatnāv abhūtām /
GK19gp12-22u:1041: tad-bhrātṛ-paryāyāś ca tad ekānugati-maryādayā paryākulās tāsāṃ kanyānām sva-putrāya nyāsam anyāyaṃ manyamānās tataḥ parāṅ-mukhā babhūvuḥ /
GK19gp12-22u:1042: kiṃ bahunā? sarva eva kevala-snehatas tatra kṛṣṇa-varatāyām eva jātehatāṃ saṃhitavantaḥ samadṛśyanta / yataḥ-
GK19gp12-22u:1047: [33] varatā-sambhāvanā-viṣayāṇāṃ pitṛ-vargaś ca tādṛg apy anargala-karṇe-japa-labdha-saṃsarga-garga-vacana-sargata eva bhinna-cittatām āpa /
GK19gp12-22u:1048: [34] putrān apy atikramya tatra sthitānāṃ kṛṣṇa eva hi sukhasatrāyate /
GK19gp12-22u:1049: [35] tad evaṃ jñāta-rahasyo' pi nirṇīta-nīti-praṇītaye rahasi vraja-rājam upavrajya sa ca tat-pitṛ-vargaḥ pratisvam eva tam artham arthayāmāsa,
GK19gp12-22u:1050: [36] āmuṣyakulikā kalitā dhanyāḥ khalu tāḥ kanyāḥ kṛṣṇanyāsata eva sa-nyāyatām arhanti /
GK19gp12-22u:1052: tadā bhaṅgībhiḥ prasaṅgam aṅgīkriyatām asmābhir iti /
GK19gp12-22u:1053: [37] vrajarājas tu tad ākarṇyam ākarṇya sa-niśvāsam idaṃ vivarṇatayā varṇitavān,
GK19gp12-22u:1054: asmābhiḥ sva-putrāya sarvathā na te sambandhāḥ sandhātavyāḥ,
GK19gp12-22u:1056: yat khalu yuṣmākam apatyāni yuṣmākam ivāsmākaṃ sneha-sātatya-vahāni samudvāhayitavyāni ca,
GK19gp12-22u:1057: tasmād asmābhir eva tatra tatra satrā-kurvadbhiḥ prayatanīyam /
GK19gp12-22u:1058: [38] tad evaṃ sthagita-samullāse nikhile ca vrajāvāse vrajapaty-anumaty-anusāratas tāsāṃ pitaras tad-vitaram ācarituṃ ruciṃ vināpi bahir udyamam ācaritavantaḥ /
GK19gp12-22u:1059: [39] tat kumāryas tv atibālya-caryā-paryākulatayā na kiñcid api cid-amatratāṃ ninyire /
GK19gp12-22u:1060: [40] atha yā kācid vṛndāvana-gahvarataḥ sākṣāt kila yogamāyāyā vyājatas tāpasyās tatra cāhvayataḥ paurṇamāsyāḥ samabhyarṇaṃ ahar-divaṃ prāyaḥ kimapi mantrāyituṃ āgantrī dṛśyate;
GK19gp12-22u:1061: yā ca mānuṣy api devīyamāneti vā devy api mānuṣīyamāṇeti vā lakṣayituṃ na śakyate
GK19gp12-22u:1062: kintu sad-ānukūlatayā tad-vana-pālitāsiṣā-dhayiṣita-kṛṣṇa-līlatā rādhādiṣu ca parama-sneha-latā yasyām anumīyate,
GK19gp12-22u:1063: sā vṛndāriketi nijākhyāṃ prakhyāpayanty api jana-vṛndena lāghavād vṛndeti svenaiva nāmnā samāmnāyate /
GK19gp12-22u:1064: sā ca samprati sarva-śocyatā-maya-tad-vārtā-śravaṇād atīvārtā tad-abhyāsam evābhyajagāma /
GK19gp12-22u:1066: paurṇamāsī tūrṇam upavrajya namaskurvatīṃ pariṣvajya śubhāśiṣā ca saṃyujya svacchamanāḥ papracchuḥ,
GK19gp12-22u:1067: kathyatāṃ katham asamayam idaṃ tava samāgamanam? iti /
GK19gp12-22u:1069: param āpadāṃ padam ekam utpannam asti,
GK19gp12-22u:1073: yāḥ khalu nityatayā kṛṣṇasya preyasya iti śrūyante,
GK19gp12-22u:1074: tāsām apy anya-sambandhaḥ sanirbandha iva dṛśyate /
GK19gp12-22u:1077: [47] paurṇamāsī uvāca-na bhaviṣyati tāsām anyenānyena saṃyoga-sambandhaḥ,
GK19gp12-22u:1078: yato mayā hi māyayā parā nirmāya nirmāsyate tatra pratibandhaḥ /
GK19gp12-22u:1080: [49] paurṇamāsī uvāca-na syād api tasyāpi sthitiḥ,
GK19gp12-22u:1086: [50] ataeva putrotpatty-abhāvāt pāyayantyaḥ śiśūn payaḥ ity atra śiśūn ity eva payaḥ ity eva ca vakṣyanti,
